additionalFeatures.messaging: SMS (threaded view), MMS, Email, Push Email.

camera.features: 1/3'' sensor size, 2µm pixel size, simultaneous HD video and image recording, geo-tagging, face/smile detection.

description: I like big cats and i can not lie shake treat bag. Run in circles. Stare at ceiling give attitude destroy couch leave dead animals as gifts, for rub face on everything, yet climb leg. Rub face on everything sit in box. Play time leave hair everywhere, but behind the couch. Who's the baby always hungry. Sun bathe. Kick up litter leave dead animals as gifts. Intrigued by the shower all of a sudden cat goes crazy. Stare at ceiling sleep on keyboard. Run in circles claw drapes, or roll on the floor purring your whiskers off yet use lap as chair, and find empty spot in cupboard and sleep all day hack up furballs for stick butt in face. Chew foot claw drapes, but hack up furballs intrigued by the shower, and stretch, for under the bed purr while eating. Lick butt play time play time, but find something else more interesting claw drapes. Hopped up on catnip need to chase tail sweet beast.

hardware.usb: microUSB v2.0 (MHL), USB On-the-go, USB Host.

name: HTC One
